column2: Floating hint from edit text - inspired by Matt D. Smith's design: http://dribbble.com/shots/1254439--GIF-Mobile-Form-Interaction?list=users

column5:
Version 0.0.6

- Bumping version
- Fixing lint issues
- Cleanup

Merge pull request #36 from HozakaN/develop

Fix a bug where the floating label background would not use the edit tex...

Merge pull request #19 from andreidd/master

Small bug fixes
Utils class for generating unique view ids.

Bug fixes

Fixed the following bugs:
1. If we have multiple controls on the same activity, with different texts, whenever the activity is recreated(on rotation for example), all the controls take the same text
2. When we have multiple controls on the same activity, and set texts to each one programmatically, all hint text views have an alpha of 1 - only the currently selected one should have alpha = 1, the rest should have alpha = 0.33

Adding to Maven central

- Creating example project
- Renaming from floatlabeledittext to library
- Fix for inputtype (#5)
- uploading to maven central

Merge pull request #4 from andrewgiang/master

Fix usage error

Merge pull request #2 from Nemisis/updates

Am now mirroring EditText API. Added more style attributes.
Am now mirroring EditText API. Added more style attributes. Added text and hint text color. Saving state (can probably be removed). Using dimens now instead of hard coded values in the layout.
Fix constructor for API versions below 10
